name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark & clean Imgur direct link page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the new blinding white imgur direct link page and gives you a normal, dark view.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imgur just recently released a new direct link page which is quite bright and unnecessarily cluttered. This extension will replace the whole page with a normal direct-image page.

Source code: https://bitbucket.org/trentv4/dark-clean-imgur-direct-link-page
